entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, who has just achieved an "Outstanding" O.W.L. He is described as passing Umbridge beside the door and meeting her eyes.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts, who is described as having a nasty smile playing around her wide, slack mouth.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper and teacher at Hogwarts, who is teaching a class on the edge of the forest. He is trying to guess what creatures they are examining.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who has a day off from studying with him.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who is sitting her Ancient Runes exam on Friday.

relationships.description: Harry and Umbridge met each other's eyes beside the door.
Harry and Ron are friends, as they have a day off from studying together.
